title: Found a gamebreaking bug.
body:
Someone left during champ select as I was picking masteries, then this happened.

Had to restart the client to be able to accept a match...

http://imgur.com/9V7xwJT

replies.body:
Aha, there was something similar on legacy too, I think it was summoner spells though. If you had the selection thing open when you went into loading screen it would be stuck on your client till you made it into a new select and could actually interact with it again.

Submit a bug report via the little icon in the bottom right of the client. It's something that's pretty specific and should be pretty easy for the team to reproduce and then fix :)

Thankfully not something that would come up too terribly often.
